article.title: CACI Supports Integrated Ship Self Defense
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: CACI Technologies Incorporated, Chantilly, Virginia, is being awarded a $24 million contract modification for systems engineering services in support of integrated ship self defense. This procurement is to provide professional engineering, technical, training, software, project service, logistics services, fleet modernization, internal communication systems, combat system switchboard and other in-service engineering agent products necessary to support the Ship Self Defense System of the Naval Surface Warfare Center, Port Hueneme, California, the contracting activity. Services will be required at shore sites, land-based test facilities, shipyards, and aboard ships in port and at sea.
